statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeContacts;
SELECT full_name, email_address, phone_number FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE team_name = 'Engineering';
SELECT full_name, team_name FROM EmployeeContacts ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, email_address FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE team_name = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT employee_id, full_name, phone_number FROM EmployeeContacts ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, team_name FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE employee_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM employee_contacts;
SELECT id, name, email FROM employee_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM employee_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM team_contacts ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM team_contacts WHERE team_email = 'team@example.com';
SELECT * FROM employee_contacts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM employee_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com';
SELECT * FROM employee_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM employee_contacts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_email FROM team_contacts ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeContacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeContacts ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TeamContacts WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT team_name, first_name, last_name FROM TeamContacts JOIN EmployeeContacts ON TeamContacts.team_lead_id = EmployeeContacts.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeContacts;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeContacts WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, first_name, last_name FROM TeamContacts tc JOIN EmployeeContacts ec ON tc.team_lead_id = ec.employee_id;
SELECT contact_method, contact_value FROM ContactMethods WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY contact_method DESC;
SELECT * FROM TeamContacts JOIN EmployeeContacts ON TeamContacts.team_lead_id = EmployeeContacts.employee_id ORDER BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT team_name FROM Teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, receiver_id FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTeams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Employees WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Teams JOIN EmployeeTeams ON Teams.team_id = EmployeeTeams.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT Employees.full_name AS sender_name, Messages.message_text FROM Employees INNER JOIN Messages ON Employees.employee_id = Messages.sender_id WHERE Messages.receiver_id = 2;

SELECT Employees.full_name AS sender_name, Teams.team_name, Messages.message_text FROM Employees INNER JOIN Messages ON Employees.employee_id = Messages.sender_id JOIN EmployeeTeams ON Employees.employee_id = EmployeeTeams.employee_id JOIN Teams ON EmployeeTeams.team_id = Teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE email LIKE '%@company.com%';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_members FROM teams JOIN team_members ON teams.team_id = team_members.team_id GROUP BY team_name;

SELECT location_name, department FROM locations JOIN employee_locations ON locations.location_id = employee_locations.location_id JOIN employees ON employee_locations.employee_id = employees.employee_id WHERE employees.department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' AND email LIKE '%@company.com';
SELECT team_name, first_name || ' ' || last_name AS team_lead_name FROM teams JOIN employees ON teams.team_lead_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS team_size FROM teams JOIN team_members ON teams.team_id = team_members.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING COUNT(employee_id) > 3 ORDER BY team_size DESC;
